Learning_Outcome: Explain the purpose of financial reporting and the objectives of general purpose financial statements.
Key_Concepts: Objectives of financial reporting; users; qualitative characteristics
Description: Basic understanding of why financial statements are prepared and who uses them.

Learning_Outcome: Apply the principles of revenue recognition to various transaction types.
Description: Use IFRS 15 concepts to recognise revenue from contracts with customers.

Learning_Outcome: Evaluate accounting treatments for financial assets and liabilities under IFRS 9.
Description: Analyze and assess the appropriate classification and measurement of financial instruments.

Learning_Outcome: Identify and evaluate appropriate sources of audit evidence for various assertions.
Description: Determine the reliability and sufficiency of audit evidence based on risk assessment.

Learning_Outcome: Compute tax liability for companies in Singapore.
Key_Concepts: Tax computation; deductible expenses; capital allowances
Description: Apply Singapore Income Tax Act to determine corporate income tax payable.

Learning_Outcome: Apply the Code of Professional Conduct and Ethics to ethical dilemmas.
Description: Assess ethical threats and propose safeguards in compliance with ISCA EP 100.
